Contact

Thanks for stopping by. If you want to collaborate, discuss a role, ask a technical question, or flag an archive correction, this is the best place to reach me.

Email is the fastest path for most things. If you are reaching out about a specific talk, article, or role, a short note with context is always appreciated.
